# PKInkingTool.InkType.pen

**Case**

An inking tool that creates the appearance of a pen-based drawing.

## Declaration

```swift
case pen
```

## Choosing ink types

- **PKInkingTool.InkType.marker**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a felt-tip marker.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.pencil**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a narrow line from a pencil.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.monoline**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a monoline pen.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.fountainPen**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a calligraphy pen.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.watercolor**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a watercolor brush.
- **PKInkingTool.InkType.crayon**: An inking tool that creates the appearance of a crayon.
